title: Will name changes cost the same amount after we convert to blue essence?
body: Sorry if this was posted already, or was asked and answered, but I haven't found anything on it. Will the name changes still cost 13000 (in essence)? I haven't seen anything posted about it.

replies.body: I wanna say that it will stay 13000 essence, but i'm not 100% sure! We'll be finding out tomorrow however. Super excited to see how everything pans out :)
